official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct a second large lock at Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a second large lock at Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, at full Federal expense. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct a second large lock at Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan.
